I started tuition with Jaryl in June as a private candidate after performing extremely poorly in my first A-Level attempt. Previously, I relied heavily on memorising concepts and model answers, and I struggled with genuine content understanding. After joining Jaryl‚Äôs lessons, he transformed the way I approached the subject. He made content far easier to grasp by teaching me to understand concepts instead of memorising them, and he equipped me with many effective tips and strategies to tackle challenging questions. His guidance greatly boosted my confidence and it clearly showed in my second attempt at the A-Levels. I only wish I had started tuition with Jaryl much earlier, because he helped me improve more in half a year than I did in my entire two years in JC.

Jaryl has been really patient with me throughout the year, using mindmaps to give me a good overview of each topic before explaining them in depth later on, and giving me clear notes and annotations to guide my revision for exams. He also helped me change the way I think about chemistry as a subject, making me realise that it is experimental in nature, which enabled me to be more fluid in my application of concepts in questions. With his help, I managed to go from an E in WA1 to an A in JC1 Promos!

Besides simply breaking down mathematical concepts for easier learning, Jaryl dissects each topic in a non-linear fashion, enabling me to gain a broader perspective of the subject and a deeper understanding of how various concepts or ideas are related to each other. Through this approach, I am able to identify similarities across different topics, which not only reinforces my learning in Mathematics, but also helps me apply his methods to studying other subjects, deepening my overall interest in learning.

As a private candidate and a slow learner, taking A levels again after not doing well the first time was an extremely daunting task. Having to learn everything again from scratch without the school‚Äôs support and having to practice worksheets on my own really affected my morale, making it extremely difficult for me to find the motivation to study. However, the way Kaiser taught chemistry made it engaging and the step-by-step feedback that he provided made chemistry fun and less of a chore. Despite not having the support of a school, Kaiser provided a structured curriculum that focused on my weaker topics and reinforced the stronger topics. Throughout my time with Kaiser, he constantly pushed me and sent me reminders during the week, which kept me on track and renewed my motivation. Thanks to his dedication, as I sat for my A levels this year, I felt even more confident than I did previously with the school.

Throughout my time in JC, I felt confused and overwhelmed by the number of terms and processes in biology. As H2 Biology consisted of many microscopic molecules with complex names and functions, I found it very difficult to even piece together the processes and resorted to rote memorisation and regurgitation, which led to me struggling and eventually dreading biology as a subject. After starting tuition with Kaiser, he broke down different questions using systematic methods, which segmented the core parts of the question into topics, which made it much easier for me to get the key words and marks. Other than that, Kaiser is able to simplify biology and helped me to visualise processes as a car and the molecules as parts of a car using various mnemonics and visualisation tricks, which greatly helped me. His system works for me, as only a month after starting with Kaiser, I improved 2 grades from a D to a B.

Before joining Kaiser‚Äôs classes, I was completely distraught after scoring an S for both Biology and Chemistry in my mid-year exams. I felt lost, discouraged, and honestly unsure if I could ever catch up. But from the very first lesson, Kaiser changed everything. His clear explanations, structured notes, and constant encouragement helped me rebuild my confidence step by step. He never made me feel ashamed of my mistake. Instead, he used them to help me understand better. With his guidance, I not only improved, I soared. I‚Äôm proud to say that I went improved 3 grades in just a few months in both Bio and Chem. I would highly recommend Kaiser as a biology and chem student if you want a patient, caring and amazing tutor.
